languages.text: "Впрочем, если вы развернетесь и покинете лагерь, а затем не станете препятствовать нашему отбытию с мира... Даю клятву, мы более не причиним вреда ни одному мон-кай на этой планете. На всех ваших мирах".

traits.locale_text: "Впрочем, если вы развернетесь и покинете лагерь, а затем не станете препятствовать нашему отбытию с мира... Даю клятву, мы больее не причиним вреда ни одному мон-кай на этой планете. На всех ваших мирах".
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "However, should you turn back and leave the camp, and then do not impede our departure... I swear not a single mon-keigh will come to harm on this planet. Or on any of your worlds."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, если вы развернетесь и покинете лагерь, а затем не станете препятствовать нашему отбытию с мира... Даю клятву, мы более не причиним вреда ни одному мон-кай на этой планете. На всех ваших мирах".

traits.locale_text: "However, should you turn back and leave the camp, and then do not impede our departure... I swear not a single mon-keigh will come to harm on this planet. On any of your worlds."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "However, should you turn back and leave the camp, and then do not impede our departure... I swear not a single mon-keigh will come to harm on this planet. On any of your worlds."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "However, should you turn back and leave the camp, and then do not impede our departure... I swear not a single mon-keigh will come to harm on this planet. In any of your worlds."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "However, should you turn back and leave the camp, and then do not impede our departure... I swear not a single mon-keigh will come to harm on this planet. In any of your worlds."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "However, should you turn back and leave the camp, and then do not impede our departure... I swear not a single mon-keigh will come to harm on this planet. Or on any of your worlds."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "However, should you turn back and leave the camp, and then do not impede our departure... I swear not a single mon-keigh will come to harm on this planet. Or on any of your worlds."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: «Pero si dais media vuelta y os vais del campamento, y luego no ponéis trabas a nuestra marcha... juro que ni un solo mon-keigh sufrirá daño alguno en este planeta. Ni en ningún otro de vuestros planetas».
languages.original_text: "However, should you turn back and leave the camp, and then do not impede our departure... I swear not a single mon-keigh will come to harm on this planet. Or on any of your worlds."

traits.locale_text: «Pero si dais media vuelta y os vais del campamento, y luego no ponéis trabas a nuestra marcha... juro que ni un solo mon-keigh sufrirá daño alguno en este planeta. En ninguno de vuestros planetas».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: “不过，如果你们立刻转身离开，不要阻挡我们的去路……那我发誓，无论是在这颗行星，还是在你们其他的世界，我们都不会伤害任何一只猴子。”
languages.original_text: "However, should you turn back and leave the camp, and then do not impede our departure... I swear not a single mon-keigh will come to harm on this planet. Or on any of your worlds."

traits.locale_text: “不过，如果你们立刻转身离开，不要阻挡我们的去路……那我发誓，无论是在这颗行星，还是在你们其他的世界，我们都不会伤害任何一只猴子。”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: « Cependant, si vous quittez le campement et nous laissez partir sans essayer de nous arrêter... je vous promets qu'il ne sera fait aucun mal aux mon-keigh de cette planète ou de vos autres mondes. »
languages.original_text: "However, should you turn back and leave the camp, and then do not impede our departure... I swear not a single mon-keigh will come to harm on this planet. Or on any of your worlds."

traits.locale_text: « Cependant, si vous quittez le campement et nous laissez partir sans essayer de nous arrêter... je vous promets qu'il ne sera fait aucun mal aux mon-keigh de cette planète et de vos autres mondes. »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: 「だが、もしお前が引き返してキャンプを去り、我々の旅立ちを妨げないのであれば…この星でモン＝ケイに危害を加えないことを誓う。いや、どの世界でもだ」
languages.original_text: "However, should you turn back and leave the camp, and then do not impede our departure... I swear not a single mon-keigh will come to harm on this planet. Or on any of your worlds."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、もしお前が引き返してキャンプを去り、我々の旅立ちを妨げないのであれば…この星でモン＝ケイに危害を加えないことを誓う。いや、どの世界でもだ」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Aber solltet Ihr umkehren und das Lager verlassen und unsere Abreise dann nicht behindern ... Ich schwöre, dann wird keinem einzigen Chem-Pan-Sey auf diesem Planeten Schaden geschehen. Auf keiner Eurer Welten."
languages.original_text: "However, should you turn back and leave the camp, and then do not impede our departure... I swear not a single mon-keigh will come to harm on this planet. Or on any of your worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Aber solltet Ihr umkehren und das Lager verlassen und unsere Abreise dann nicht behindern ... Ich schwöre, dann wird keinem einzigen Chem-Pan-Sey auf diesem Planeten Schaden geschehen. Auf keiner Eurer Welten."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Ancak geri dönüp kampı terk ederseniz, ayrılmamıza da müdahale etmezseniz... Bu gezegendeki, hatta dünyalarınızdan herhangi birindeki tek bir mon-keigh'in bile zarar görmeyeceğine yemin ederim."
languages.original_text: "However, should you turn back and leave the camp, and then do not impede our departure... I swear not a single mon-keigh will come to harm on this planet. Or on any of your worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak geri dönüp kampı terk ederseniz, ayrılmamıza da müdahale etmezseniz... Bu gezegendeki, hatta dünyalarınızdan herhangi birindeki tek bir mon-keigh'in bile zarar görmeyeceğine yemin ederim."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader
